content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in jefferson dropping off a few items at her parents house for storage around 8:30 pm because we are in the middle of moving. two black unmarked military helicopters flew overhead just above the treetops. a few minutes later they circled by again but were a bit higher up and i took a short video. they headed east/southeast towards the direction of our house.

my wife and i headed home a few minutes after the helicopters passed by. when we were about 2-3 miles from our house we noticed something in the sky. it was an immensely bright light hovering in the sky in front of us ( it looked to be quite far away, probably 4 miles or so). my wife and i both saw it and have no idea what it was. it wasn't a helicopter with a searchlight, because there was no beam of light coming from it. it was like looking at a very bright star, except it was only a few miles away.

my wife slowed down as we were heading up the dead end road that leads to our house. i was going to get out and start filming. that's when it just suddenly  vanished right in front of us. i have never seen anything like that before. it was almost like it was able to cloak itself. one moment it was there, and then the next gone.

this is the third ufo we have seen in this area in about a month. the first was a huge black triangular aircraft that we followed for about 45 minutes.This was seen around 8:30 also. two black helicopters were seen flying low by my cousin at about 8:30 in the town he lives in which was about 20 miles from me. the second was a white cigar shaped object that just hovering in the sky in front of us for about 15 minutes as we were driving home. it was pointed down at probably a 20 degree angle. when we got home i went to record it but it was gone
content.summary: Bright ball of light hovering in the sky for a few minutes, suddenly disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking through my kitchen when an object caught my eye out the window. i am used to seeing airplanes and helicopters since there is an airport nearby. this object stood out at first because of its unusual color which was teal blue and very bright. the object would hover from left to right in about a range of 200 feet then it would hover back at its original position then drop down behind treetop out of my view very quickly and then gain altitude to hover again at the original position it started at. the object would continuously perform this odd maneuver for twenty minutes. the last sighting i had of the object was when it quickly descended behind the treetop and never reappeared. 

i observed this object for 20 minutes with my wife while taking photos and video. this object was not a plane or helicopter and i also took into consideration of any remote operated vehicles which it could not have been either due to the size, and speed. the prominent colors were teal-blue, purple, white, and red. when the object would change color it was as if the objects color would mix with another color to create a new solid very bright pulsating color. an example would be like dropping food coloring into a small glass of water and seeing it mix.

i will include the photo and will provide video upon request.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange object observed over treetop

content.detailedDescription:
I was siting outside my home when i looked up and saw some lights.
the lights where red green and white. i took out my cell phone and started to record what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights that went from red to white to green

content.detailedDescription: Bell ranger chasing a red orb
content.summary: Saw a helicopter chasing a red orb

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, june 26, 2014, i had just gotten off the 94 millennium bus at the corner of portobello and innes roads at approximately 10:40 p.M. i was walking down the left-hand side of the road, on the sidewalk, heading southeast to my home. out of the corner of my eye, to my left, i spotted a large, very bright orange light flying over the tops of the homes. i kept walking, following it along until it started to slowly descend, much like a meteor would. as it descended, its light flickered off, as though it was reflecting the sun's light (much like a satellite), then the light got bright again and it descended past the homes and i lost sight. two seconds afterwards, a second orange light came into view from the same northeast direction, heading southeast. it was the same colour, same size, following the same flight path. 

i stopped walking to confirm that there was no sound coming from the light. a few seconds later, with the second light still in view, a third light appeared. again, same size, colour, brightness, direction and trajectory. again, no sound coming from any of the lights. i continued walking and looking at the lights as they followed one another, same distance apart, and then descended down and sort of flickered off like a spark. a fourth and final light followed them and again, i lost view of it behind the homes.

i am very familiar with aircraft and what they look like at night. my father is an airforce pilot and i have been around planes my whole life. these lights caught my attention because they were so big, like giant orange orbs, silently flying along, slowly descending to the ground. i thought at first they were firework sparks falling from the sky and flickering out, but they weren't falling from the sky like fireworks were, and they were much bigger and closer. they certainly weren't planes flying in formation, they were silent, smooth in flight, orb-like and seemed to appear from the northeast part of the sky.

i felt very excited while i was witnessing them, taking great care to watch and make mental notes of their direction and characteristics. my phoned had died that day, otherwise i would've taken videos and pictures. when i got home, about ten minutes later, i called the police and reported my sighting to them. they said they'd have someone check out the area.
content.summary: Four bright, orange lights silently flying by in orleans

content.detailedDescription:
In gainesville, texas on tyler st. came home from work to find the entire block filled with people looking up in the sky, talking about the ufo. many took footage on cell phones. the lights were lined up horizontally, then right before it disappeared, the lights instantly lined up vertically as if the object turned on it's side then sped away. looked like a solid object larger than a plane. no feelings other than awe. have heard of a lot of sightings in this county over the last year but this is my first. i thought people were making stories up until this event. a relative took a cell phone video.
this thing reminded me of the tinley park, il sighting
content.summary: Extremely large triangle shaped craft with three lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside in san rafael,ca and above me were two clouds, shape-shifting,instantly! from one thing to the next, with ease. each second it would break apart and come together creating diverse shapes, which grabbed my attention. so i began to shoot this wild cloud display and it became obvious after a few minutes, that despite the windy day, these clouds were not moving at all. not floating by like the others, just stationed over-head yet appearing then regressing. oddly,i saw something far off sitting there against the blue hue of sky and the white of the cloud. i took the shot,then just stared,trying to refocus my eyes, then it was gone!Just like that! this picture is all i managed to snap of it. it is completely overwhelming and i'm hoping to be debunked in anyway shape or form. sadly, this isn't my first capture. just the most clear. -sincerely, mortified!
content.summary: Quickly came as fast as it went...... was lucky to get a shot at all. it seemed to hover as if posing for the shot before instantly vanishing. -completely scared!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking. looking at the night sky in twin peaks.  looking south, around 10 pm this time, i catch a large fireball looking object over a mile away and descending from sw to s id guess 7,000 ft - 6,500 ft in 3 seconds across two inches of sky. it went behing some tall pines and flashed bright & then out (or i lost its path behind trees).  ive seen many strange blinking lights very far away 5-10 miles up with random period blinks (12-16 seconds apart) and soundless.  saw what looked light a satellite going very fast (satellites are slow moving compared to this) but it changed directions 3-4 times.  15+ sightings.  i have live audio (basically a play-by-play from me) and many audio files of these accounts with specific dates/times & event description.  kept written & audio log.  these events have spanned over 3 years.
content.summary: Seen many strange lights and fireballs over my skies. witnessed 15+ ufos. flashing glowing huge

content.detailedDescription: I i have seen two diff ufo's while visiting my mom in the countryside where you can see millions of stars. the first siting was only of a red light but it was soo far away it had to be huge. it sat above the treeline, it stayed long enough for me to get my mom and say look at this weird star. it then began to move up and down weirdly and zoomed up and outa there faster than i have ever seen.This was a few mths ago then about two weeks ago i stayed the night again and as i sat on the porch i saw three lights going on and off in a row kinda chasingeachother. it was far away but maybe a half mile up in the sky it was pitch black out and it was blacking out the stars, thats how i know it was circlier flatter on top though. it hovered but did like a back in forth like trying to balance then slowly kept the back and forth  and moved but also slowly. it went behind a tree that aas in my view and my daughter who was also watching said mom look its shining a light down. now literally like you see in the movies a spotlight then zoomed beyond fast and was gone.
content.summary: 2 different ufo's, 2 different nights. answer refer to 2nd ufo

content.detailedDescription:
The night of the meteor shower, i went out on my porch to see the meteor
shower and take pics with my iphone5. i was hearing something around the house and since this is a rural area and wooded one has to be careful. i took several photos of the ground and one in the air.There was nothing there the first time. i saw a meteor and pointed it back up to the sky. that's when i saw it. i was taking photos fast and appeared to get it. i left the photo raw (no touching up at all) so the digital signature on it would be there untouched. since that time my wife noticed what appeared to be claw (not demonic)marks on my back. every day since i have a new mark upon my body. i am a military man of almost 20 years and i know how absurd it sounds. i didn't believe in ufo's until that night. the "thing" i saw was not short but about 7ft tall with long claw-like finger nails. i know to tell anyone this is nuts so i stay quiet but i'm tired of the deep marks on my body, arms and legs.  i need help. believe me or not this is torment. thank you for your time. there are other things that i have gone through and in my home but i beg just a minute of your time to read this! thank you for at least listening. i was in shock and turned around and went inside the home
content.summary: I was the night of the meteor shower. i went on my porch to see

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were driving home from my moms at approximately 9:30 p.M. when i saw a very bright and very large orange light in the sky. i made him pull over to look closer. it looked either diamond or triangular in shape. it did not look like any helicopter or airplane i ever saw, plus it was closer than either one of those would have been, but we heard no noise. i would compare it to the size of the moon on a normal night (but obviously closer). it didn't really look like it was too high up. we stopped and stared for a little and it's pace seemed slower than that of an average aircraft we would be used to seeing. however, we had to move because we stopped in the middle of the road. we drove less than a mile, and watched it in the sky. but when we arrived home (less than a mile away) we did not see it anywhere. i never saw anything like it in my life. i was shocked and in awe. we did make a turn, so it's possible it went to the other side of the mountain, which is likely since that's the direction it was heading in. i haven't heard from anyone else who saw it. when i first saw it, i didn't know what it was. it didn't look like an airplane or helicopter, plus we live in a small town so we don't see too much of that kind of activity anyway. i noticed it because i was looking out the window as we were driving and had to stop because i didn't understand what it was.
content.summary: Large orange colored diamond/triangle in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at around 0845 hrs. i notice a bright light in the sky that caught my attention, i looked up and saw a red and green light that was far to low to be an airplane. the light was moving very slowly to the south. i moved to an open area clear of trees, the light then changed direction and was now moving towards the north, then back and fourth. i was trying to listen for the sound of an helicopter, but i could here nothing. i ran back to my apartment to tell my wife and daughter and to get a camera. by the time i returned the light was gone.
content.summary: A red and green light a right next to each other, was trveling from north to south then came back to the north, then moved back and fourth. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was closing my curtains and looked out my open window.  saw what appeared to be an airplane at first, but crossed the horizon much too rapidly and the two glowing orbs were very large compared to the other 6-7 aircraft in the area.  i watched it cross the entire horizon in less than 2 seconds without sound.  it stopped on the eastern horizon and went straight upwards very rapidly, then descended at the same incredible speed with no pause between the rise and descent.  then went to the horizon.  i called my wife to come quickly to the front yard to look, but by the time we got outside and got our bearings it had vanished.   no bs..!!!
content.summary: Two connected glowing orbs. left was blue, right was red came from horizon and changed direction rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
North of 2629 se ruffin terrace in sky red and blue purple  circles in sky  overlapping.  moved quickly back and forth then disappeared 10:40 est moved from right to left  then gone  my 3rd sighting in 2 months

1  i was on phone looking out at sky
colors and movement
2.
a ball of light  unkown
feelings another sighting this is third in  months.  went for camera...Gone

thought i might have heard a humming sound
object disappeared

sister was on phone w me.  she pointed out i am by nuclear power plant  which is on hutchinson island
content.summary: Red bright purple circles interesting then gone after  darting

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving southeast on mt.Sydney rd. when i observed a bright shining object approximately 45 degrees above the horizon. i initially thought it was a star but it then began to dim so i thought it may have been a commercial aircraft reflecting the sun.. but i didn't see an aircraft shape. it had merely remained a circular dull white orb. as i continued down the road, the round object just continued to dim until it completely disappeared.
at no time did i observe a vapor/contrail. it just slowly disappeared as if it were moving away from me. 
my reaction was excited. i've seen other objects that were unknown to me in the past, but ultimately ended up being something that could be explained.. this was completely different.
i have no photos to confirm my siting. 
i'm a retired state trooper with 25yrs  of criminal and traffic investigations.. i've learned how to evaluate the facts of an incident. 
my main reason for submitting this is to see if my description fits any known reports from the past.. 
thank you
kevin.
content.summary: Driving southeast in a clear blue sky, i observed a bright shining in the sky.Few seconds later,it dimmed to a solid round object that began to fade.Then disappeared.No contrail observed.

content.detailedDescription: The witness stated that he was walking about one-half mile from his home when he saw a highly reflective/oval object moving from the northwest to the southeast.  his impression was that it was coming from the duane arnold energy center and passing over marion,iowa which is only about two miles from rockwell international.  chinook helicopters were reportedly seen traveling the same flight path two hours later.  the next day, two chinook helicopters were seen traveling the same flight path.
content.summary: Highly reflective object moving at about 80 mph

content.detailedDescription: i was waiting for a bus i looked up and i saw a fire ball i thought it might be a helicopter but i saw it clearly it was a fireball then a smaller one was behind it then they went behind the trees i couldnt see them after that
content.summary: Two fireballs flying one a bit bigger

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of june 25th btwn 10:30 pm and 11:00 pm i looked up and out my kitchen window and saw 3 huge bright yellow/orange balls of light hovering and pulsating over the mountains to the west of my home. they were so big that i could not believe what i was seeing. i went outside onto my balcony and observed them. they hovered for about 5 minutes or more and then then moved down behind the mountains in the same formation that they appeared. the back side of the mountain was glowing for about 5 minutes and then about 12 to 15 smaller bright yellow/orange balls of light rose out of the mountain and hovered in the same place as the last set were. some of the balls seemed to change their shape as they were pulsating. after about 5 to 10 minutes they went back down behind the mountains. the mountain glowed again for a few minutes and then it went dark. the whole experience lasted for about 30 minutes. it was extremely upsetting to see something like that. i was in total shock.
content.summary: Strange lights were seen in the western sky over southern california

content.detailedDescription: Have picture looked like something punched a hole in the sky then left fog and a bunch of math oriented lines in sky still don't feel good about this never seen any thing that comes close to this
content.summary: I have pictures you will want please contact me

content.detailedDescription: I was filming a common passenger jet and testing my new camera with full 60x zoom.  as i kept the jet liner in the middle of the screen,  a bright white object drops in from the upper right of the frame.  the object pulsated and changed shape as it flew right by the passenger jet.  i then began to track the "foo fighter" type object.  i followed the bright orb until it just vanished into thin air; not a cloud and not a plane changing direction.  i then zoomed out trying to figure out what i had just filmed exclaiming "what the hell was that"? shot with a sony avchd progressive. 9.2 mega pixels, 26.8mm lens handycam.
content.summary: As passenger jet flys by, a glowing, pulsating foo fighter type object drops from above and through the flight path of the jet.

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing the same ufo for 10 yrs from my backyard in perth . it always comes from the east    over the horizon and nearly always ends roughly  when its directly above me. it looks like a pulsating star that moves like a jerky praying mantis is the best way to describe it. the events last any where from a couple of seconds to a couple of hrs. i bought a hd video camera for the purpose of getting footage  of which i have hrs and hrs of . it is most commonly seen at 12.10 am until 1 am . i live near the main  airport in perth and know what planes look like and have spent many yrs observing satellites and all kinds of things in the sky and believe me this thing makes no sense at all  . it doesn't seem to be doing anything logical and it is well disguised if you don't know what you are looking for. several of my friends have been witness also . i would love nothing more than someone tell me what i am looking at. so if any of you are genuinely interested in seeing something that needs an explanation contact me you can have all the footage .Its driving me nuts nobody seems to give me answers its so frequent now i don't bother filming it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Ive been witness to this ufo for 10 yrs i have hrs of footage.

content.detailedDescription: I had came down stairs from my girlfriends condo and headed towards my truck and i just looked up and i saw two rings of green glowing light overlapping flying north with no sound. a flashing red light from a plane showed up @ 300-500 yards behind the object railing @ 4 o'clock position. i have seen many aircraft at night and been to the airshows at the local marine corps air station at mira mar for their night shows as well and never seen anything like this objects. i pointed it out to my girl friend and asked me "what is that?" to which i replied, "i don't know, i have never seen anything like that, have you?" to which she replied, "no." the object continued northward and was soon gone from vision because of the light pollution of the city lights. i would put the object @ 500-1000' in elevation and seemed to be @ 30-60 foot across considering the altitude. it happened so fast i did not have time to pull out my phone and attempt a picture or video. i was to busy studying the object because i was just amazed and puzzled to what it could be.
content.summary: Two rings of green glowing light overlaping flying north with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I woke up to see 2 enity's  one of them in front of my bed and the side i was about to scream when one of them put there hand and front of me and i passed out. i woke up  hours later in bed.
content.summary: I woke up from my bed when in the corner i saw two enity's and one of them quickly ran to the side of the bed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my friend's back porch looking at my cellphone. my friend's wife all of a sudden said, "what's that?" i looked up and saw a object with three lights start to dim and it looked like it started to "cloak" it had this weird auro around it, and it looked kinda like it was surrounded by water and it started to disappear. i could see what looked like a black craft, but it happened so fast that i can't say for sure what color it was. after it was gone my friends wife then told me she saw three bright reddish orange lights in the formation of a triangle in between the trees then she followed it until it went behind their house. she said she say the same weird "cloaking" effect that i saw. i remember feeling a very weird sensation in my body right before she said "what's that" i of course had some anxiety after but the feeling i had right before i saw it was different...
content.summary: My friend said "what's that" i looked up and saw something "cloaking" and then it was out of view behind the house.

content.detailedDescription:
L need somebody from mufon to come visit my place and 
to have a good talk that i need your help that l
do not want to be ufo victim at all the times!!!!!
l'm fed up with aliens and the incidents.
oh by the way!!!! i can't hear the phone so you can
use texting at my cell phone or send me an email!
thank you! maryanne anderson
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I need your help!!!!!!!!!! i'm not crazy and very honesty with truthful words!

content.detailedDescription:
i didn't see the object it was above my house well my house and about six other peoples homes tree top level i guess,i was talking to my neighbor about a ufo me and a girl friend had seen when we were driving back from the movies when i was a teenager that was a boomerang with lights all around bigger than the moon stood still for about a min then took off if you blinked it was gone. so he starts talking about this big object he had seen with all kinds of lights i thought he was talking about in indiana or where ever the hell he was from turns out he says this was last summer were we lived
he went outside to make sure his car was locked before he went to bed he was walking back to the house when he looked up and seen it just above the trees,he started to kind of freak out about it and didn't want to talk about it anymore but he said the woman across the street was out side so she might have seen it too, i talked to her about it she said she had seen it to but never said anything to any body didn't want to be seen as crazy she gave me more detals said it was just above the trees three houses long three houses wide big with lots of lights i asked here were the center of it would be she said my house now this was sort of freaking me out, this was a first time for them  but a second encounter for me but, really wouldn't have known anything if they didn't speak out. she said the lights looked like they were moving but not moving? it was silent made no noise stayed for a min or so and then was gone, were right by a main street so i think its strange no one else seen this driving by.
content.summary: Big lots of lights that cast no beams of light neighbor didnt want to talk about it scared.

content.detailedDescription: my 2 daughters, grandson and i were driving up to idaho to visit my mom, and as we got to walker lake, i spotted white flying objects in the sky they were far away, we pulled over got out of the car, i took my camera and was filming them, because we could not understand what they were, could not count them,there was many of them, they were not birds, they were all the same shape kinda of like boomerang shape, or a triangle shape, they were in control or something was controlling them, they approached closer to us we were the only ones out there, so we got frightened. got in our car and left, never saw where they went. i tried to took a close up picture off the video, to see them you will have to get a more close up of them, but you will see them off of the picture that i send.
content.summary: Saw maybe 50 or more,like white cluster of flying objects, all the same shape hovering over walker lake

content.detailedDescription: Three glowing balls hovering in high speed around each other for 15 min then blue and red disappeared and orange-red stood for 2 min and also disappeared to the horizon in ultra high speed. i was riding a motorcycle back home and i was passing a forest path it was so dark and i could see those lights hovering on top of the big laguna like 1 mile away from me. i stood there, and made two pictures, but pics are not that good cos i was using my mobile and it was dark. anyway i never ever saw something like that, the last glowing light disappeared on the horizon and left a light trail like sort of star wars hyper jump thing, it was just amazing. i can send pictures if anyone interested.
content.summary: Three glowing balls hovering in high speed around each other for 15 min then blue and red disappeared and orange-red stood for 2 min and also disappeared to the horizon in ultra high speed

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving home heading southwest within 0.25 miles of our home when i noticed that an unusual orange light came into view in left upper windshield. other than orange color, it was size and height consistent with an aircraft.  it went out of view of the front windshield and my son could see it out the passenger window.  when we arrived home we both could see the orange light silently pass over us heading north-north west.  in the brightness of the twilight horizon, the light dimmed until it left our view.  my son went into the back deck and called for me saying the object could still be seen from there.  we have a sliver of the northwest horizon we could see between the trees and neighbors's house and a dimly orange object could be seem appearing stationary quite far away. i asked that he get the binoculors from upstairs and he could see that the objest in the binoculors.  it had been about 2 minutes since we arrived home, and while still looking at the distant object from the back deck, a second identicle light appeared over our house traveling the same northwest direction.  as it moved further away, against the twilight backdrop, the light disappeared and we could make out a dark round shape.  my son viewed with binoculors and then gave to me.  it seemed to stop far away, just a dim speck on the horizon, occasioanlly seeing an orange flicker in the identicle spot the first object appeared to be.  at this point we could no longer see two objects.  the orange color brightened and appeared to do a u turn coming in the general direction back toward our house.  it became quite bright heading staight south until the mature trees along a fence line west of our home blocked our view. we went out into the front yard which has a more open view to the sky and a what sounded like a helicopter could be heard traveling quite low from the southwest.  as it passed overhead, the typical stobe lights, sound and physical outline of a helicopter could clearly be made out.
content.summary: Two silent orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching tv when i got a text form my sister, saying the orange lights were in the sky again. she said again because 8 days ago, on june 18, 2014 at 10:58 pm, we saw two orange balls of light hovering,spinning,and pulsating, with strange spider web like lights stringing around the orange lights, they were stationary and blinked in and out, we stared at it for 20 minutes until the orange lights blinked out and never came back on. which brings us to tonight june 25,2014 11:00pm looking south west towards riverside ca. with a text from my sister saying check out side the orange lights are back. so i got up and checked outside, to my surprise i saw nothing then all of a sudden an orange light just appeared above the tree line out of the blue where 20 secounds before there was nothing at all. she was correct, it was not a plane nor was its flares. i was looking at just one orange round light in the shy pulsating above the tree line. then another orange round light appeared just to the left of the first orange light. then all of a sudden about 5 more orange lights appeared above the first two, then about 30 more orange lights appeared above them. there was so many i lost count after 10. at first the objects were stationary for about 5 minutes pulsating and wobbling with an golden halo around each individual objects. as they all light up it was shaped like a big triangle. then as if on command all the orange lights that appeared slowly started to drop altitude until the lights went behind the trees and held altitude for another couple minutes flashing orange and red before fading out. i was happy, and shocked to see that many orange objects appear out of the darkness at one time it was so amazing to finally see with my own eyes and it be a mass sighting of ufos. thanks
content.summary: Saw 3 lights for bout 5min then disappeared bout a couple mins later 30-50 lights wut looked to be part of a mother ship lights were in a form of an upside down cone but lights were not straight were 3d like their lights coming out the window...E win
